5 Rekomendasi Film Horor 'Lawas' Terbaik
01 Nov 2019, 05:19 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


'The Exorcist' sempat menuai protes karena adegan yang ditayangkan dianggap terlalu menakutkan. (dok. Warner Bros. Pictures via imdb.com)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Horor selalu menjadi salah satu genre film yang paling menarik. Produksi film horor seakan tak pernah putus, setiap tahun banyak rumah produksi yang membuat film yang memacu adrenalin tersebut.Horor sebagai genre kemudian terus berkembang, melahirkan berbagai sub genre. Beberapa di antaranya adalah genre horor psikologis, misteri, dan slasher.Meski begitu, genre horor tidak menjamin suatu film akan bagus. Ada pula film yang biasa saja, buruk dan bahkan sangat buruk.Sebagai salah satu situs data informasi yang berkaitan dengan film, IMDb membuat peringkat film horor dari masa ke masa. Berikut lima film horor terbaik versi IMDb. 1. Psycho (1960)Film berdurasi satu jam 49 menit ini bercerita tentang perempuan bernama Marion Crane (Janet Leigh) yang bekerja sebagai sekretaris. Ia memiliki pacar bernama Sam Loomis (John Gavin), mereka belum bisa menikah karena belum cukup uang.Suatu hari Crane menggelapkan uang majikannya sebesar USD40 ribu, uang itu ia gunakan untuk kabur dan memulai hidup baru. Di tengah perjalanan ia terjebak badai sehingga harus menginap di sebuah motel, saat itulah hal mengerikan terjadi.2. Rosemary's Baby (1968)Film ini bercerita tentang pasangan muda yang pindah ke sebuah apartemen. Ternyata di tempat baru itu mereka dikelilingi oleh tetangga aneh. Peristiwa-peristiwa yang tak dapat dijelaskan mulai terjadi, membuat curiga Rosemary (Mia Farrow) dan Guy Woodhouse (John Cassavettes).Rosemary yang lantas mengetahui dirinya mengandung mulai merasa janinnya diincar oleh sesuatu yang tak kasat mata. Ketakutan seolah mengontrol kehidupannya.3. The Texas Chain Saw Massacre (1974)Tidak seperti horor kebanyakan yang menampilkan sosok hantu, film ini lebih menunjukkan kesadisan seorang pembunuh. Ia kerap menghabisi hidup korbannya dengan gergaji mesin.Suatu hari, dua orang berada dalam perjalanan menuju rumah nenek di Texas, bersama tiga orang teman. Perjalanan itu menjadi petaka ketika mereka melewati rumah jagal yang ditinggali pembunuh bergergaji mesin.


Film 'The Shining' disebut sebagai salah satu film horor paling melegenda. (dok. Stanley Kubrick Film)

4. The Shining (1980)Seorang penulis bernama Jack Torrance (Jack Nicholson) sepakat mengambil alih sebuah hotel setelah meneken kontrak. Hotel itu diketahui memiliki masa lalu kelam, hingga kerap menakuti para pengunjung. Ternyata hotel tersebut lambat laun juga mempengaruhi Jack, ia berubah jadi orang yang lebih kejam dan pemarah. Sementara anaknya menggunakan cara-cara khusus yang disebut sebagai The Shining untuk memberitahu orang-orang di luar tentang hotel tersebut.5. The Exorcist (1973)The Exorcist bercerita tentang anak perempuan yang kesurupan. Ia bertingkah tidak jelas dan kerap mengamuk, bahkan wujudnya juga sedikit berubah.Demi menyelamatkan sang anak, ibunya meminta bantuan kepada dua pendeta. Kisah berputar pada usaha penyelamatan si anak. The Exorcist diangkat dari novel berjudul sama yang rilis pada 1971 dan menimbulkan kontroversi karena adegan yang ditampilkan dianggap terlalu brutal. (adp/rea)

5 Best 'Old Legacy' Horror Film Recommendations
01 Nov 2019, 05:19 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


'The Exorcist' had drawn protests because the scene aired was considered too frightening. (doc. Warner Bros. Pictures via imdb.com)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Horror has always been one of the most interesting film genres. Horror film production seems never to break, every year many production houses that make films that adrenaline. Horror as a genre then continues to develop, giving birth to various sub genres. Some of these are psychological horror, mystery, and slasher genres. Even so, the horror genre does not guarantee a film will be good. There are also films that are mediocre, bad and even very bad. As one of the data information sites related to films, IMDb ranks horror films from time to time. Here are five of the best horror films of the IMDb version. 1. Psycho (1960) This one hour and 49 minute film tells the story of a woman named Marion Crane (Janet Leigh) who works as a secretary. He has a girlfriend named Sam Loomis (John Gavin), they have not been able to get married because there is not enough money. One day Crane embezzled his employer's money of USD40 thousand, the money he used to run away and start a new life. On the way he was caught in a storm and had to stay at a motel, that's when terrible things happened. Rosemary's Baby (1968) This film tells the story of a young couple who moved into an apartment. It turned out that in the new place they were surrounded by strange neighbors. Unexplained events began to occur, making Rosemary (Mia Farrow) and Guy Woodhouse (John Cassavettes) suspicious. Rosemary, who later found out she was pregnant, began to feel her fetus being targeted by something invisible. Fear seems to control his life. The Texas Chain Saw Massacre (1974) Unlike most horrors that feature ghostly figures, this film shows more the sadism of a murderer. He often finishes off his victim's life with a chainsaw. One day, two people were on their way to grandma's house in Texas, with three friends. The trip was disastrous as they passed the slaughterhouse inhabited by machine saws.


The film 'The Shining' is said to be one of the most legendary horror films. (doc. Stanley Kubrick Film)

4. The Shining (1980) A writer named Jack Torrance (Jack Nicholson) agreed to take over a hotel after signing a contract. The hotel is known to have a dark past, which often scares visitors. It turns out that the hotel is gradually also affecting Jack, he turned into a more cruel and angry person. While his son uses special methods called The Shining to tell people outside about the hotel. The Exorcist (1973) The Exorcist tells the story of a girl possessed. He acted unclear and often raged, even his form also slightly changed. To save the child, his mother asked for help from two priests. The story revolves around the child's rescue effort. The Exorcist was taken from a novel of the same name that was released in 1971 and caused controversy because the scenes shown were considered too brutal. (adp / rea)
